TopicTitle: Say Hello to the White Bar Group!

Articles.Content:
> 
> MEMO: Add this guy: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/108295-AlphaAsh](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/108295-AlphaAsh)

Just want to clarify that my going white is not a protest. I actually like repping and getting rep but I also like the colour white.

EVA Report from the surface of Jool

You are surprised that there is something to stand on, but then you forget about that while thinking about the limeade-air.

You compress some of the air into a container.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-06T14:54:22Z" title="07/06/2015 02:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 6, 2015</time> by FireFaced**

> 
> Just want to clarify that my going white is not a protest. I actually like repping and getting rep but I also like the colour white.

Well, the fact is, I didn't make this as a protest, more as a joke. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Well, the fact is, I didn't make this as a protest, more as a joke. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I also like jokes, so that works out well then ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Oh and I am not arrogant. I'm obnoxious. I find the distinction important. Or not. Depends on what day it is.

> 
> I also like jokes, so that works out well then ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Oh and I am not arrogant. I'm obnoxious. I find the distinction important. Or not. Depends on what day it is.

That's a actual quote from a blog post of yours. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) But I can add obnoxious, if you like.

> 
> I started this as a joke, and somebody mentioned it being the new green iron crown, so I made a joke about that.

That was me.

> 
> That's a actual quote from a blog post of yours. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) But I can add obnoxious, if you like.

It's Monday. That's arrogant. Wednesday is obnoxious. Actually, I should check my calendar.
I may or may not qualify
Did anybody see my EVA report?
Should I join you guys? I like show my rep as a social status sorta thing but you guys seem chill.

Yes. Yes you should.

:hailprobe:

> 
> Yes. Yes you should.
> :hailprobe:

I'm in! 
:hailprobe:
As I am overseas without access to my KSP save or PowerPoint files, I am checking out of the Green and into the White for the duration. Vive les BLANCS!
I now formally tender my resignation from this proud organisation as it's Tuesday and that's bored and fickle day. Might join you again some time. Probably on a Saturday which is nostalgic day.

> 
> I now formally tender my resignation from this proud organisation as it's Tuesday and that's bored and fickle day. Might join you again some time. Probably on a Saturday which is nostalgic day.

Lol. **\*shreds resignation papers\***

This might be a stupid question, but what does it mean?

I've recently began to see it on a number of users, and I haven't seen anything explaining why.

> 
> This might be a stupid question, but what does it mean?
> I've recently began to see it on a number of users, and I haven't seen anything explaining why.

It's when users decide that they want to hide their reputation from other users. It's mainly a joke.
Overlapping threads merged.
Goodbye guys, I'm leaving.

> 
> Goodbye guys, I'm leaving.

Noooooooooo
I get that it's a joke. I just don't get the joke.

> 
> I get that it's a joke. I just don't get the joke.

It's a parody of the Light Green Group. It's a bit funny because absolutely anyone can join, and MRS' blurbs about people are closer to a roast than the more complimentary ones in the LGG.
Yay? xD

I want to join! Especially to see the blurb written about me.

> 
> Nobody really knows anything about this guy. He did something with Krakens, I think. Just another noob.

> 
> Yay? xD

> 
> I want to join! Especially to see the blurb written about me.

Added.
